name: Frog Game (Wang Leng, initialshl, IanTeo, AngShiYa)
name_original: Frog Game (Wang Leng, initialshl, IanTeo, AngShiYa)
description:
You are a frog being chased relentlessly by a bird. Leap your way across the different biomes to escape from it, before you become the bird's prey!

Submission for the Game Off 2019 game jam hosted by GitHub. The theme was "Leaps and Bounds", and our game features a frog leaping away from the predator's bound.

Developed by:

  • Ang Shi Ya (Programmer, Artist)
  • Ian Teo (Programmer, Game Designer)
  • Ong Heng Le (Programmer, Artist)
  • Tan Wang Leng  (Programmer, Music & Sound Designer)
